title: Teemo/Kathus banned One4All OCE, not banned EUW
body: why is/are teemo/karthus banned for oceanic one for all mode? EUW doesnt have them banned. why are we different? {{item:2050}} **Discrimination.**{{item:2050}}

replies.body:
(clears throat) 
"OCE does not have a large enough player base to support the champions karthus/teemo in the featured game mode 'one for all' therefore said champions will be disabled for the full duration of the event, apologies for any inconvenience."

thats the usual response to why we don't get stuff everyone else does right?
Well the apologies, I understood it was a joke, but I've seen too often on these boards that particular joke posted with serious/sarcastic intent so I apologise for my misunderstanding.
No worries ^^ it was in poor taste anyway

They were mistakenly left enabled on some servers for a few hours when All for One launched, there was a tweet about it somewhere, Don't know what servers but I'm pretty sure NA was one of them (I think OCE might have had them enabled for an hour or two as well from what I've heard but I don't actually know so don't quote me on that), if they're still available on EUW I imagine they just didn't see it quick enough and they will be disabled soon.
Yeah they were left on on our server too. I played All for One as Teemo but not Karthus.

Was it fun? I only vaguely remember playing it the very first time One For All came out. I remember it being both hilarious and hilariously broken but that's about it :( Are they still enabled in custom games I wonder >:)
It was definitely different. All our team were pretty bad Teemos players though. And Teemo and Karthus were usable last night in One for All Customs, should still be I guess.
Hmm, well the point is just to have fun in the end I guess :P
